original_text: I know what it is like to need things. I also know what it is like to have more than enough. I have learned this secret. I know how to be happy whatever happens. I can be happy when I have enough food to eat, and also when I am hungry. I can be happy when I have plenty of things, and also when I have nothing.
korean_text: 나는 비천에 처할 줄도 알고 풍부에 처할 줄도 알아 모든 일 곧 배부름과 배고픔과 풍부와 궁핍에도 처할 줄 아는 일체의 비결을 배웠노라

sentences.original_text: I know what it is like to need things.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 필요한 것이 있을 때가 어떤 것인지 압니다.

sentences.original_text: I also know what it is like to have more than enough.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 또한 넉넉할 때가 어떤 것인지 압니다.

sentences.original_text: I know how to be happy whatever happens.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 무슨 일이든 행복해지는 방법을 압니다.

sentences.original_text: I can be happy when I have enough food to eat,
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 먹을 것이 충분할 때 행복할 수 있고,

sentences.original_text: and also when I am hungry.
I can be happy when I have plenty of things,
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 많은 것을 가질 때 행복할 수 있고,

sentences.original_text: and also when I have nothing.
sentences.korean_translation: 아무것도 없을 때도 행복할 수 있습니다.
